Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to third-party food delivery service charges
Summary: Prohibits third-party food delivery services from charging a food service establishment a delivery fee that totals more than a certain percent of the total purchase price of an online order.
LawCode: Add ยง391-v, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to third-party food delivery service charges; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
